net.sf.mmm.client.base.gwt

Class AbstractEntryPoint<GINJECTOR extends ClientGinjector>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.client.base.gwt.AbstractEntryPoint<GINJECTOR>
  • Type Parameters:
    GINJECTOR - is the generic type of the ginjector.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.gwt.core.client.EntryPoint

    public abstract class AbstractEntryPoint<GINJECTOR extends ClientGinjector>
extends Object
implements com.google.gwt.core.client.EntryPoint
    This is the abstract base implementation for an application client using the framework based on GWT, GWTP and GIN.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

        private void cancelBackspaceNavigation()

      • createExceptionHandler

        protected com.google.gwt.core.client.GWT.UncaughtExceptionHandler createExceptionHandler()
        This method creates an GWT.UncaughtExceptionHandler. It may be overridden to customize.
        Returns:
        the GWT.UncaughtExceptionHandler to use.

      • onModuleLoadDeferred

        protected void onModuleLoadDeferred()
        This method is called deferred from onModuleLoad() to ensure that the initial setup (esp. GIN) is already in place.
